full_sentence: This. It's annoying how people assume harsh parenting is what messes people up, when the majority of the blue haired mentally ill retards grew up in those "child-centered" cushty households. Beat your kids when they act retarded. Simple.
A woman's beauty exacerbates her features
All women are the same, they say 'no' but they really want to, don't listen to that word! it's a trick
I actually am surprised that she hasn't been murdered after all her nasty comments

I absolutely LOVE that Chappelle has popularized calling them "the poor whites.". It really makes you think about how rarely we refer to white people as "whites" collectively; it's almost always "white people" or "the white demographic." Meanwhile, we say "Blacks" and "Latinos" constantly, without thinking twice... Even more, I think we should use the slur "chavs" more often, it's so appropiate
